GapFillInput.Title: Education
GapFillInput.Instruction: Work out the anagram in each sentence below, and then type the word into the gap.

Content.Question:
1. Some university graduates celebrate graduation day by jumping in the river! (onuatidgra)
2. Richard failed his chemistry exam for the second time, so he decided to take a refresher course in
the summer. (ferresreh)
3. Patrick’s parents were not happy when they found out he’d been skipping his chemistry lectures. (ppiiskng)
4. Ulla did an online course in note-taking and study skills as she had no transport to get to the college. (enilon)
5. Qualifications are very important in today’s competitive work place. (ionstacifilqua)
6. Ruby preferred to do a vocational course rather than an academic one to train to be a chef. (naliotavoc)
7. Eddie works long hours during the week, and she even works some weekends. She’s a workaholic. (rkwohaolic)
8. Some school-leavers take a year out before university to travel or get some work experience. (nceirepeex)
9. Mrs Brooks is proposing a crash course on managing your finances for all first year students. (ashcr)
10. Learning a foreign language at school is a great way to prepare for travelling abroad on holiday or
in a job. (ngierof)
